channel.title: GitHub AutoHotkey Daily Trending
channel.description: Daily Trending of AutoHotkey in GitHub

item.title: sxzxs/Real-time-translation-typing
item.description: 实时打字翻译软件、语音实时打字、语音实时翻译、LOL 语音打字

item.title: CemuUser8/mouse2joystick_custom_CEMU
item.description: An AutoHotkey Script to allow the use of Mouse and Keyboard control in CEMU. This uses vJoy and provides several additional features over regular keyboard control, like: the ability to control the camera with the mouse, toggle walking speed, in BotW use MouseWheel to change weapons, a separate Toggle key for ZL useful for locking onto a target …
